Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Brimstone Highlands are overrun with enemies and predators.

Destroy any {@LinkCreature:4#1031#sooty sporewalkers}, {@LinkCreature:4#1032#smoldering ghilliedhus}, {@LinkCreature:4#1041#ashstalker wolves}, {@LinkCreature:4#1051#devan war golems}, {@LinkCreature:4#1052#fallen devan protectors}, {@LinkCreature:4#1061#devan dark knights}, and {@LinkCreature:4#1062#risen devan infantry}.

Report to Keinie at Cauldron Outpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
